name: Calctron
tagline: A beautiful desktop calculator app built on Electron
body:
# calctron
A beautiful desktop calculator app built on Electron


![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/CodyPearce/calctron/master/images/calctron.png)

## Features

* Basic Arithmetic
* Minimalistic
* Beautiful

## Downloads

* Linux (not all distros will work)
  * x32
  * x64
* OS X
* Windows 8+
  * x32
  * x64

## Development

### Requirements

* Node v4 +
* Electron 

Once those are installed simply

```
git clone https://github.com/CodyPearce/calctron.git
cd calctron
npm install
```
then to start the app 
```
npm start
```

to build to linux x64 you can just run
``` 
npm run buld
```

to build to other OS's look at the documentation for electron-packager

## Contribute

Make a pull requests or fork to your heart's content.

## License

MIT license
